snippet: Meleko Mokgosi is the recipient of the inaugural Mohn Award, a prize given by the Hammer Museum in Los Angeles whose winner is chosen by museumgoers from a pool selected by art professionals.
abstract: Meleko Mokgosi is the recipient of the inaugural Mohn Award, a prize given by the Hammer Museum in Los Angeles whose winner is chosen by museumgoers from a pool selected by art professionals.

headline.main: Hammer Museum Awards Its Crowdsourced Art Prize
headline.print_headline: Hammer Museum Awards Its New Art Prize
